description:
Software support teams are in a tough spot. They know documentation is
important, and they love to refer customers to it, but finding time to
actually write and maintain those documents is *really* hard.

That endless support queue and its ceaseless demand for attention mean
that documentation is too often ignored. Mat shares his hard earned
practical advice to help technical writers and support team knowledge
base owners create a more effective documentation system.

Learn why documentation falls behind, how to reduce support writing
friction and how other SaaS teams have made support an engine for great
documentation.
title: Power up your support team to create better documentation
